name: Intelligence Infinity
description:
You are a newly born AI, and are training to gain your own body.

This is the final phase of your testing: how will you interact with the world? 

Are you able to stand on your own? 

Or will you fold at the first obstacle? 

Go through the 5 different test rooms which stand before you, but be careful: should you fail, we already have your next iteration ready.

A game by Cime-Art.

Development team
  • GAME DEV :
    • Maxime Sanchez  « Maxime66410 »
    • Corentin Michel
    • Guillamue Berna
  • GAME DESIGN :

    • David « IsatiX » DESPLANQUE
Configuration
  • MINIMUM :
    • 64-bit operating system and processor required
    • Operating system : Windows 7 SP 1 ; 64 bit
    • Processor : Core i3
    • RAM : 4 GB of memory
    • Graphics : GeForce GT 720 1GB VRAM ; DX11 required
    • DirectX : Version 11
    • Disk space : 1000 MB available disk space
  • RECOMMENDED :
    • 64-bit operating system and processor required
    • Operating system : Windows 7 SP 1, 8.1 or 10 ; 64 bit
    • Processor : Core i5
    • RAM : 6 GB of memory
    • Graphics : GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 2GB VRAM ; DX11 required
    • DirectX : Version 11
    • Disk space : 2 GB available disk space
